subject: California Chrome (Race Horse)
Horse Racing
Preakness Stakes
Kentucky Derby
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
lead_paragraph: California Chrome, who has put on 35 pounds since winning the Kentucky Derby, was made the 3-5 morning-line favorite and will break from the No. 3 post in the Preakness Stakes on Saturday.
snippet: California Chrome, who has put on 35 pounds since winning the Kentucky Derby, was made the 3-5 morning-line favorite and will break from the No. 3 post in the Preakness Stakes on Saturday.
